About Me

Hello my name is Cruz Contreras Ramos. I've been working in commercial and residential construction for more than 20 years in the bay area, working indoors and outdoors. I have a handyman license and insurance in case of any incident. If you have a project in mind, call me at (510)-692-7520 or email me cruzcontreras49@yahoo.com
